attributes.action: review our "Grass Root" proposal for UK Recession.  We envisage the end and future deliver of Benefit Labour workforce, reducing the claimants of Employment & Support Analysis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
2008 – 2009 Recession, the end and future vision within the UK & EU initially.  Driven by a Benefit Labour workforce, engaging claimants on Employment & Support Allowance and Job Seekers allowance with redeemable benefit credits through online agency employment coordinated by Job Centre Plus & DWP. Via online 3D virtual platform, delivered by the government.


We will deliver interactive tele working and hotdesk centres, throughout the UK to provide broadband connectivity via fibre optic backbone network.  We will operate within a VPN utilising a virtual environment as the platform to empower and employ individuals on Employment & Support Allowance (ESA).  Claimants will enrol via Job Centre plus and other associated Government websites.  They will be required to work a flexible 20 plus hours a week for benefit credits which can be claimed fortnightly for capital payment of a new State Benefit.
